title: Settings

paths.name: Paths
paths.temp_dir: We download files here, then move processed files to the Output Files folder.

cache.name: Cache
cache.desc: User Database contains important data. Do not delete it carelessly.

default.name: Default Options
default.desc: If the options below are unavailable in the searched resource, the highest available ones will be used.

proxy.name: Network Proxy
proxy.desc: Only HTTP(S) is supported yet. Restart the app for global changes to take effect.

auto_download.name: Auto download
auto_download.desc: After adding a task, automatically start downloading

format.name: Naming Format
format.desc: If the downloaded resource does not contain any of the variables here, that variable will be -1.

add_metadata.name: Add metadata into media file
add_metadata.desc: After download, embed title, description, author, tags, cover, etc. into media file.

prefer_pb_danmaku.name: Prefer downloading danmaku via ProtoBuf
prefer_pb_danmaku.desc: the ProtoBuf method can get almost all danmaku, but processing time will be longer.

about.name: About
about.thanks: If you find it useful, please give me a Star on GitHub!

askDelete: This action cannot be reverted. Are you sure?
